Perusahaan menawarkan properti yang terkelola secara profesional mulai dari apartemen, villa dan rumah. Inventaris properti kami sudah tersedia di lebih dari 25 kota di Indonesia.Travelio menyewakan unit secara keseluruhan tidak per kamar. Selain itu, untuk area Jakarta, Anda dapat menemukan unit-unit apartemen yang berstandar hotel, dimana unit-unit tersebut dikelola secara langsung oleh tim Travelio Property Management (by Travelio). company_description: CODE.ID was previously a unit business of INTEGRASI, a system integrator established in 1999 that also provides software services. INTEGRASI was listed in Jakarta Stock Exchange and went to back to become a private company again in 2007. In 2015, CODE.ID become an independently run company which currently has around one hundred passionate developers with a myriad number of skill sets. We focuses on helping our customers turn their best ideas and innovations into a product --  that can be enjoyed and used in any computing platform, with any technology available.We believe that a product does not only have to be built with passion, but it also has to be functional and technically sound. It must also be easy to use and perhaps entertaining. With that being said, it requires having a team of passionate and technically adept engineers.For more than 15 years, we have delivered more than 100 with highly satisfied and returning customers.Below are some facts about us:• Hundred of successful application development and implementation in small and large projects.• Broad industry knowledge in banking, multi finance, insurance, pharmaceutical and manufacturing.• Highly qualified of software development team, in two development locations: Jakarta & Yogyakarta.• Provide innovative and state-of-the-art technology or solutions.• Have been assisting our clients for development of complex requirements for more than 16 years.• Have been working as a team for more than 400 man-years experience.• Most of our projects are delivered on time, on budget, and at a competitive price.

title: Operations Lead
description: We are seeking a motivated and experienced Operations Lead to join our team. This role requires strong leadership, organisational and execution skills, as well as a broad knowledge of different business functions, including administration, customer onboarding, and qualifications. As an Operations Lead, you will play a pivotal role in optimising our operational processes for scalability and ensuring all tasks are coordinated and executed timely and efficiently.
responsibilities: Oversee and manage operational processes, ensuring scalability and efficiency.
Coordinate and execute tasks within set deadlines across various departments.
Act as a liaison between different departments and stakeholders to ensure smooth operations.
Manage administrative tasks, including but not limited to facilities management, office procurement, and record-keeping.
Oversee the customer onboarding process, ensuring a seamless and positive experience.
Ensure all customers are qualified under our service terms and conditions, adhering to legal and compliance standards.
Drive continuous improvement initiatives to increase operational efficiency.
Act as a change agent, encouraging a culture of high performance and continuous improvement.
qualification: Minimum Bachelor’s degree from reputable universities with relevant majors.
3+ years of success in an operations or project management role.
Proven ability to manage and coordinate projects and initiatives to completion.
Excellent leadership skills with the ability to manage teams and individuals effectively.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to make decisions under pressure.
Capable of designing and implementing scalable processes and solutions.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Startup mindset, ownership, and a proper balance of quality and sense of urgency!
Strong understanding of other business functions including legal, human resource, finance, real estate or technology is a plus

company_description: Travelio.com merupakan perusahaan berbasis online pertama untuk penyewaan rumah jangka pendek yang bertempat di Indonesia. Perusahaan menawarkan properti yang terkelola secara profesional mulai dari apartemen, villa dan rumah. Inventaris properti kami sudah tersedia di lebih dari 25 kota di Indonesia.Travelio menyewakan unit secara keseluruhan tidak per kamar. responsibilities: Collaborating with stakeholders and users to define product requirements, understand user needs, and incorporate business goals.

Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices for creating visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces and experiences.
Ability to conduct user research, analyze data, and apply insights to inform design decisions.
Excellent visual and communication skills, with the ability to articulate design concepts and solutions clearly and effectively to stakeholders.
Experience with designing web and mobile platform (Android and iOS).
Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and adapt to changing priorities and deadlines.
Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work in a fast-paced environment.
Knowledge of front-end web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus.
Familiarity with design systems, accessibility guidelines, and user testing methodologies is a plus.
